    • Uses of Brush in BlobsSystem

      Subclasses of Brush in BlobsSystem 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CircleBrush
      A circle brush is a brush materialized by a 2D circle.
      class  RectangleBrush
      A rectangle brush is a brush materialized by a 2D rectangle.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void ParticlesSystem.addForce(Particle particle, Brush brush, Vector[] mouvement)

      protected void ParticlesSystem.delete(Particle particle, Brush brush, Vector[] mouvement)
